name: FAXED
description:
ESCAPE THE BORING OFFICE LIFE, BE FREE

In a 90s office, there is a fax machine called Chris that after printing thousands of faxes, started thinking about its unpleasant situation and decided to run away. Play as Chris and avoid the boss and his unpleaseant employees by hiding behind furniture and inside the delivery boxes found around the office, by crouching under their lines of sight or even by avoiding everyone in hope no one sees you

Good luck and get Chris out of there!

There are also More Pros to Escaping:

• Low poly game

• Set in the 90s

• Lighthearted with a Comedic Feel

To Control Chris Use:  For the Dualshock5 Controller Users

Left Analog Stick - Navigate Menus and Character Movement In-game

X Button - Confirm in the menus or Interact in-game

O Button - Back in the menus and Crouch in-game

Options Button - Opens the Pause Menu

TouchPad - Shortcut to the Settings Menu

For the Mouse and Keyboard Users:

WASD Keys - Navigate Menus and Character Movement In-game

Enter - Confirm in the menus

E Key - Interact in-game

Esc  key - Back in the menus and opens the Pause Menu

Ctrl key -  Crouch in-game

Credits

Alexandre Rodrigues (Game Developer)

João Martins (Game Artist)

Lucas Ventura (Game Designer)
